overview: Sweat and sex go together in the world of porn. With bodies like the one on Cherokee and some nasty hard-core sex you just can't go wrong. Cherokee is back like you've never seen her before. Watch as she and her cast of sex-starved maniacs fill up every hole possible with oil, sweat and sex. 18-year-old mixed girl Tyra Spanks does an unforgettable fireplace romp with John West. As with all of her scenes, the screen is lit up when Cherokee takes on Van Damage and then Anthony Hardwood in two of three filthy encounters. Find out who has the best body in porn!
title: Sweat
